attributes.action: stop wasting taxpayers money on on Government/Government sponsored adverts on TV and radio.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government advertising on TV and radio is costing the taxpayer many millions of pounds each year which we, the taxpaying public can no longer afford. Most of the adverts are needless, irritating, and insulting, and there are far too many.
Stop wasting OUR money and telling US what to do. Get OFF our backs and STOP nannying us.
